  • Method Details

    • parse

      public static void parse(String[] args) throws InvalidArgumentException, MissingParameterException, NumberFormatException, InvalidPortNumberException, InvalidMaxConnectionsNumberException
      Argument parser method that checks commands.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments passed through cli.
      Throws:
      InvalidArgumentException - for invalid command.
      MissingParameterException - for missing param.
      InvalidPortNumberException - if port not in bounds.
      NumberFormatException - if int not found.
      InvalidMaxConnectionsNumberException - if the max number of connections is invalid.
